zh.detail_paragraph_one: Coingame作为革命性的全新平台，允许加密货币粉丝参与预测并使用完全安全和透明的方法投币。我们的系统使用智能合约技术，具备完全透明、不可更改、不可篡改的功能，确保参与者无需第三方信任即可使用ETC执行投币。
zh.detail_paragraph_two: 以太经典是一个运作智能合约的去中心化平台。智能合约完全按照程序运行，不会出现停机，审查，欺诈或第三方干扰的可能性。 以太经典秉承以太坊原链 -保留了未经篡改的历史; 不受外部干扰和对交易的主观篡改。
zh.detail_paragraph_three: 参与者作出预测并将以太经典（ETC）充入智能合约。预测周期结束后，智能合约自动检测受信任的第三方获得预测结果，向参与者分配彩金。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_one: 如果比赛结果无法得到正式确认，本平台将有权利保留延迟发奖直至得到官方的正式确认。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_two: 如果某个投币项目出现在已经有比赛结果之后仍接受投币，本平台则保留作废该投币的权利。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_three: 如果倍数明显有误，本平台保留取消该投币的权利。这包括比平均市场大于一倍倍数误差。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_four: 如果直播停顿而比赛并未受影响，所有投币类型会根据正式比赛结果发奖。当某个投币类型比赛结果无法得到正式确认，本平台保留作废该投币的权利。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_five: 本平台有权在任何时候纠正错误发奖。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_six: 如果赛事并不是依据正规形式进行(例如异常赛时，统计步骤，赛事格式等)，平台保留作废该投币的权利。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_seven: 如果一个赛事的规则或格式异于本平台接受的标准，本平台保留作废该投币的权利。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_eight: 所有投币类型将依据正规的赛时除非有另外标明。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_nine: 如果赛事无法完成或继续(例如鉴于取消资格，受到干扰，退出比赛，抽签有所改变等)，所有未能确定的投币类型无效。若有其他未被规则涵盖的项目，平台将保留做出针对个案最终性决定的权利，并且确保公平公正。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_ten: 所有投币类型(除了半场，上半场，加时赛，点球赛)将以比赛的常规时间为准。 如果一项比赛被干扰但是在开赛后48小时内继续比赛，所有有效投币依据最终比赛结果发奖，而所有未决定的投币作废。 常规90分钟：除非另有标明，否则足球投币的结算将以比赛的常规时间为准。包括伤停补时但不包括加时赛和点球赛的成绩。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_eleven: 比赛或市场结果无法被找到的，则在开球后24小时后预测无效。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_twelve: 比赛时间、比赛数据和结果将从信誉良好的第三方获取。
zh.detail_terms_conditions_win_content: 夺冠投币是指投币全联盟或联赛的结果，而非一场比赛结果。夺冠投币通常在赛季开始前，但也可在联赛过程中投币。每个国家的倍数不同。
zh.detail_terms_victory_defeat_content: 也即三向投币，通常同于预测主客场胜负或平手结果。
zh.detail_terms_victory_defeat_content_seco: 例如，您选择预测英格兰和德国的比赛结果，可以两者投其一，或者猜平手。每个结果的倍数不同。
zh.detail_terms_asian_disks_content: 这种玩法加入了对球队技术的考虑，对强队而言可以让分。也即，强队不但要赢得比赛，还需要以确定的进球数超过弱队。这避免了比赛踢平的结果，让预测成为五五开的选择。
zh.detail_terms_asian_disks_content_new: 预测足球滚球亚洲让分盘时，显示的让分数和赔率针对的是投币被接受后的比赛。之前的进球/角球/记名罚牌（即目前得分）在赛中亚洲让分盘投注中均忽略不计。除非另有规定，否则所有足球赛中亚洲让分盘投注都将根据正规赛时间期间剩余比赛时间内的进球进行结算。投币被接受前的所有进球/角球/记名罚牌均不计入内。
zh.detail_terms_scores_results_focus: 注意：球队成绩栏的加号表示“或更多”，如，“2+”表示“2球或更多”‘。
zh.detail_terms_scores_results_focus_second: 可能性比较小的情况是，当整数用于让分盘时，让分调整的最终比分可能导致平手。这种情况不算作平手，而是走盘（push）。发生走盘的，所有参与者的原始投币资金将会被退还，也即没有赢家。
zh.detail_football_explain_0_content: 如果任何一队以任何比分胜出，投币该队获胜的为赢。如为平局，所有投币计为作废，投币金退还。
zh.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_two: 球队以任何比分胜出 - 投币项为赢。
zh.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_thr: 平局 - 投币于此项的一半投币金退还客户。另一半的投币被判为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_fou: 球队以任何比分输 - 此项投币为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_six: 球队以任何比分胜出 - 投币项为赢。
zh.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_sev: 平局 - 一半投币按照所选项倍数进行结算，另一半投币退还客户。
zh.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_eig: 球队以任何比分输 - 此项投币为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_05_content_two: 球队以任何比分胜出 - 投币项为赢。
zh.detail_football_explain_05_content_three: 平局 - 此项投币为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_05_content_four: 球队以任何比分输 - 此项投币为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_05_content_six: 球队以任何比分胜出 - 投币项为赢。
zh.detail_football_explain_05_content_eight: 球队以任何比分输 - 此项投币为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_two: 球队以多于对方至少两球胜出 - 投币项为赢。
zh.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_thr: 球队以多于对方正好一球胜出 - 一半投币按照所选项倍数进行结算，另一半投币退还客户。
zh.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_fou: 平局或以任何比分输 - 此项投币为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_six: 平局或以任何比分赢得赛事 - 投币项为赢。
zh.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_sev: 球队输掉一球 - 投币於此项的一半投币金将退还客户。另一半的投币为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_eig: 球队输掉至少两球 - 此项投币为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_1_content_two: 球队以多于对方至少两球胜出 - 投币项为赢。
zh.detail_football_explain_1_content_three: 球队以多于对方正好一球胜出 - 所有投币作废，投币金退还客户。
zh.detail_football_explain_1_content_four: 平局或以任何比分输 - 此项投币为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_1_content_six: 平局或以任何比分赢得赛事 - 投币项为赢。
zh.detail_football_explain_1_content_seven: 球队输掉一球 - 所有投币作废，投币金退还客户。
zh.detail_football_explain_1_content_eight: 球队输掉至少两球 - 此项投币为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_O_U_content_one: 大小球投币也即预测体育预测中给定比赛的一项统计数字（通常是两队比分之和），参与者预测的比赛实际数字应比该数字大或小。
zh.detail_football_explain_2_handicap_conte: - 如果比赛中没有进球或只有一个进球，投币为赢。如果刚好有两个进球，投币金被退还。如果有三个或更多的进球，投币为输。
- 如果比赛中有三个或更多的进球，投币为赢。如果刚好有两个进球，投币金被退还。如果没有进球或只有一个进球，投币为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_2_25_handicap_co: - 如果比赛中没有进球或只有一个进球，投币为赢。如果刚好有两个进球，则一半投币金为赢，另一半将被返还。如果有三个或更多的进球，投币为输。
- 如果比赛中有三个或更多的进球，投币为赢。如果刚好有两个进球，则一半投币金将被返还，另一半为输。如果没有进球或只有一个进球，投币为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_25_handicap_cont: - 如果比赛中没有进球或是只有一个或两个进球，投币为赢。如果有三个或更多的进球，投币为输。
- 如果比赛中有三个或更多的进球，投币为赢。如果没有进球或是只有一个或两个进球，投币为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_25_3_handicap_co: - 如果比赛中没有进球或只有一个或两个进球，投币为赢。如果刚好有三个进球，一半投币金将被返还，另一半为输。如果有四个或更多的进球，投币为输。
- 如果比赛中有四个或更多进球，投币为赢。如果刚好有三个进球，一半投币金将被返还，另一半为赢。如果没有进球或是只有一个或两个进球，投币为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_3_handicap_conte: - 如果比赛中没有进球或只有一个或两个进球，投币为赢。如果刚好有三个进球，投币金将被返还。如果有四个或更多的进球，投币为输。
- 如果比赛中有四个或更多的进球，投币为赢。如果刚好有三个进球，投币金将被返还。如果没有进球或只有一个或两个进球，投币为输。
zh.detail_tennis_content_1_title: 若发生以下情况，相关赛事的各项投币项均继续有效：
zh.detail_tennis_content_1_1: 比赛的时间或日期的变更
zh.detail_tennis_content_1_3: 比赛场地由室內改为室外或由室外改为室内
zh.detail_tennis_content_1_4: 比赛场地的表面发生改变（无论赛前或比赛中）
zh.detail_tennis_content_2_1: 若赛事开始后未能进行完毕，所有投币无效。除非参赛者在比赛开始后被取消资格（晋级到下一轮的参赛选手/团队将被视为获胜，并依此结算）。
zh.detail_tennis_content_3_1: 若规定比赛局数未能完成，或被改变，投币均为无效。比赛必须完成，投币方为有效。若出现选手被取消参赛资格或退出比赛的情况，所有投币均为无效。
zh.detail_tennis_content_4_1: 若赛事出现选手被取消资格或退出比赛，所有投币都将被判为无效，除非投币结果已确定。
zh.detail_tennis_content_5_title: 获得冠军投币/四分之一决赛投币/半决赛投币
zh.detail_tennis_content_5_1: 选手在锦标赛中必须至少进行1分，投币方为有效。在任何未参加锦标赛的选手上的投币将视为无效。
zh.detail_tennis_content_6_1: 投币结算将以相关比赛或赛事的官方网站所公布的数据为根据。当官方网站不存在或有重要证据证明官方网站的数据有误时，我们将依据相关独立资料进行结算。
zh.detail_tennis_content_6_2: 如果缺乏一致且独立的证据，或出现明显互相矛盾的证据资料，投币将按我们自己的数据进行结算。
zh.detail_basketball_content_1_1: 篮球开赛前的投币将包括加时赛的总比分为准，除非另有标明。
zh.detail_basketball_content_1_2: 所有的赛事必须在指定日期（当地体育场时间）进行，否则投币无效。如果球赛的举行场地有改变，只要主队位置没有改变，所有已下投币依然成立。如果所列赛事中主客队的比赛改为在客队场地进行，只要主队仍为官方指定“主队”，则投币依然成立，否则投币无效。
zh.detail_basketball_content_1_3: 特别是三对三、街头篮球和Big3形式的比赛，结算将根据官方赛事规则进行。若赛事已经开始但未能完成，则投币无效，除非相关盘口的结果已确定。
zh.detail_basketball_content_1_4: 除非另有说明，二项盘口中平局规则适用。单注将退款，过关投币中该选项将视为无效/无结果/未参赛。
zh.detail_basketball_content_2_1: 投币结算将以相关比赛或赛事的官方比分提供商或官方网站所公布的数据为根据。当官方比分提供商或官方网站不存在或有重要证据证明官方比分提供商或官方网站的数据有误时，我们将依据相关独立资料进行结算。
zh.detail_basketball_content_2_2: 如果比赛被干扰或延迟而且没有在比赛开始后的48小时内继续比赛则投币作废。 如果倍数开在不正确比赛时间(大于2分钟)，本公司保留取作废该投币的权利。 如果投币类型接受投币时的赛绩有误而且对该价钱有重大影响，本公司保留取作废该投币的权利。 若比赛并不是以和局结束，但却有加时赛用作资格赛，投币将根据法定赛时结束的赛绩来发奖。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_1: 1.相关比赛的官方分数提供者或官方网站提供的统计数据将被用于结算预测。当来自官方分数提供者或官方网站的统计数据不可用时，或有重大证据表明官方分数提供者或官方网站的资料存在错误时，我们将通过独立证据计算投币。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_2: 2.如果没有一致及独立的证据，或存在重大冲突性证据时，则会在经过彻底的调查之后才会结算投币。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_3: 3.出于投币目的，Pinnacle（平博）不认可任何延期比赛、抗议或颠覆性判决。只要赛事在原定日期进行，所有相关投币均有效。如果因恶劣天气（或类似的延误原因）将比赛开赛时间推迟至当地时间午夜之后，但是只要比赛仍然举办，则所有相关投币有效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_title2: 不同输赢盘预测的定义
zh.detail_baseball_explain_4: 按以下方式接受棒球的输赢盘预测：
zh.detail_baseball_explain_5: 1.生效——球队对球队，不管首发投手是谁。如果指定投手，且在比赛之前更换投手，则将重新调整输赢盘，并采用对新投手的初始倍数对“有效”投币结算发奖。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_6: 2.指定投手——如果两位首发投手并非投币时指定的选手，则预测将被视为“无效”。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_7: 3.一位指定投手——为支持或反对一位指定投手的预测，无需考虑另一位首发投手。如果指定投手未开始比赛，则预测将被视为“无效”（例如：如“Red Sox对Helling”即指反对Helling的投币。“Helling对Red Sox”即指支持Helling的投币。）
zh.detail_baseball_explain_8: 请注意：投手姓名印刷错误不可作为取消投币的理由。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_9: 1.如果指定首发投手，且在两名指定首发投手投出至少一球之前更换投手，则总分盘（大小盘）和球队总分盘（大小盘）以及跑垒盘（让分盘）和另选跑垒盘（另选让分盘）的预测将失效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_10: 2.首发投手指向敌队的第一位打击手首次投球的投手。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_title4: 日期或地点变更的处理
zh.detail_baseball_explain_11: 1.如果比赛未在预定的日期进行，则有关该赛事的所有预测将不会生效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_12: 2.如果比赛地点发生变更，则有关该赛事的所有预测将不会生效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_title5: 比赛未按正常程序进行的处理
zh.detail_baseball_explain_13: 1.如果比赛被中止或暂停，则赢家将根据最后的全部局数确定，除非主队扳平，或在最后一局的下半场领先，在此情况下，赢家根据中止比赛时的分数确定。如果主队扳平比赛且随后被暂停，则预测将予退还。除另行规定外，比赛不会进行到第二天。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_14: 2.如果比赛被中止或进入加时赛，则分数根据最后的全部局数确定，除非主队扳平，或在最后一局的下半场领先，在此情况下，分数根据中止比赛时确定。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_15: 3.如果出现季后赛暂停的情况，而暂停的比赛成功在暂停96小时内重新开赛，则所有相关投币有效，并在比赛结束后结算。如果该比赛未能在暂停96小时内完赛，则所有相关投币无效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_16: 4.对于棒球实况赛的投币，所有比赛须完成9局（如主队领先则为8.5局），且须在比赛开始之日起7天内完成方为有效（“慈悲规则”比赛除外，参见下文）。此规则适用于输赢盘、跑垒盘和总分盘的投币。例如：实况赛在第7局被暂停且在7天内未恢复。即使投币的结果已被决定，所有输赢盘、跑垒盘及总分盘的投币均为无效。以5-8分数投币大小盘7轮的被视为无效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_17: 5.在棒球预赛或实况赛中对指定的一局或多局投币时，如指定时间范围已完成，则不论整场比赛是否结尾，此类投币均为有效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_18: 6.如果比赛被推迟到预定日期之后，在赛中盘交易市场中比赛开始前所下的投币将被取消。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_title6: “慈悲规则”比赛实况赛的处理
zh.detail_baseball_explain_19: 1.调用“慈悲规则”的游戏（例如世界棒球经典游戏）将基于在调用规则时的最终分数对所有投币进行分级。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_20: 1.竭尽全力将双赛分为G1和G2（比赛1和比赛2）。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_21: 2.投币名称有G1和G2的比赛时，将严格遵守双赛的具体比赛。例如，如果您投币首发投手为Kershaw和Scherzer的G1 Dodgers队击败G1 Nationals队，只有Kershaw和Scherzer都参加比赛1时，您的投币才会生效。如果Kershaw和/或Scherzer参加比赛2，那么在这种情况下，您的投币将不会生效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_22: 3.如果在双赛开始的那一天，G1和G2都未在投币时间命名，则使用下列规则：
zh.detail_baseball_explain_23: a. 任何首发投手投币，无G1和G2命名，将在有此类首发投手参加的比赛（不论双赛的第一场或第二场比赛）中生效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_24: b. 如果网站上的首发投手参加特定比赛，有效投币将在该特定的比赛（不论第一场或第二场）中生效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_25: c. 如果网站上的首发投手未在双赛的任何一场比赛上相遇，有效投币将在双赛的第一场比赛中生效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_title8: 生效所需最短时间（比赛时长）
zh.detail_baseball_explain_26: 1.除非主队在4.5局后领先，否则比赛的结果在5局后方可作算。投币让分盘、总分盘（大小盘）或球队总分盘（大小盘）时，比赛必须打满9局（如果主队领先，则打满8局半）投币才生效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_27: 2.如触发领先或慈悲规则，则将被视为完整的比赛。对让分盘、总分盘、球队总分盘及输赢盘的投币将为有效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_28: 3.美职棒比赛必须持续5局或4.5局（如果比赛提前结束），而且主队宣布赢家，输赢盘和让分盘上半场投币才起效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_29: 4.如果前5局的比赛没有完全完成，则所有对上半场比赛的投币将失效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_30: 5.如果指定比赛投手，则所有对上半场比赛（首5局）的投币也都必须指定投手。如果任何一位指定投手没有进行首发，则所有对上半场比赛（首5局）的投币将失效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_title9: 美国职棒大联盟常规赛季胜场特别投币：
zh.detail_baseball_explain_31: 1.MLB常规赛胜场投币必须满足以下两者才能获得结算：
zh.detail_baseball_explain_32: a.从数学角度看，球队无法打赢投币中指定的比赛数。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_33: b.预计球队在发奖时至少能打160场比赛。换言之，结算时没有任何关于赛季将被缩短的迹象。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_34: 2.出于发奖结算目的，所有为争夺外卡或分区的附加赛决胜局都不计入该常规赛季的总胜场数。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_35: 3.如果怀疑球队在赛季打不到160场比赛，那么我们将等到第160场比赛之后再结算常规赛季胜场投币。然而，常规赛季胜场投币一经结算即不会再更改，即使球队最后打的比赛少于160场。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_title10: 满垒本垒打（客队得分vs主队得分）：
zh.detail_baseball_explain_36: 1.满垒本垒打将由特定联赛预定于该日举行的所有比赛的总得分决定。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_37: 2.预定的所有比赛须打满9局（如主队领先则为8.5局），且须在预定日期开始，满垒本垒打的投币才算有效。如果预定的所有比赛均符合上述条件，那么即使一场或数场比赛在打完9局之后被暂停，满垒本垒打的投币仍然有效。满垒本垒打将于比赛日当晚进行结算。在常规赛季中，于之后某天重新开始的已暂停比赛的得分不会影响满垒本垒打投币的结算。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_38: 3.在满垒本垒打（客队得分vs主队得分）中，在自己的第一局中第二个击球的球队得到的分数算作主队得分。某些罕见的情况下，第二个击球的球队并不在自己的主场上比赛。在这些情况下，第二个击球的球队仍将被视为这个特别投币中的主队。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_title11: 满垒本垒打（客队得分vs主队得分）：
zh.detail_baseball_explain_39: 1.所有美职棒垒─安─失数投币将通过跑垒、安打失误的总数决定。例如：
zh.detail_baseball_explain_40: 2.则表示LA Angels队的MLB安─垒─失分数为11，而Cleveland队为24
zh.detail_baseball_explain_41: 3.在MLB安─垒─失总分盘（大小盘）或MLB安─垒─失让分盘的投币中，比赛须打满9局（如主队领先则为8.5局）方为有效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_42: 4.如果比赛被中止或进入加时赛，则分数根据最后的全部局数确定，除非主队扳平，或在最后一局的下半场领先，在此情况下，分数根据中止比赛时确定。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_43: 5.如果指定比赛投手，则对于所有MLB安─垒─失数的投币，两队的指定首发投手都必须有实际首发。首发投手指向敌队的第一位打击手首次投球的投手。如指定投手未能首发，则所有投币将为无效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_44: 1.在任何投币中，运动员必须首发，并且在指定的游戏中投球（若为投手）或者具有一个打席（若为位置球员），以使投币有效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_45: 2.对于有关那支球队将首先得分的预期投币，一旦有球队得分则立即确定预期投币输赢，不管该场比赛最后是否正式有效。两个指定投手必须首发才有效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_46: 3.有过第一轮比赛结果的所有预期投币将在第一轮比赛结束后立即确定预期投币输赢，不管该场比赛最后是否正式有效。两个指定投手必须首发才有效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_47: 4.在总垒数特别投币中，列出的球员必须先发。击球手的总垒数仅计算一垒安打（一垒）、二垒安打（二垒）、三垒安打（三垒）或本垒打（四垒）。保送、触身球、失误、投手假动作、野手选择或接后失球都不计入总垒数特别投币中。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_48: 5.投手投币“允许的总分数”包括已获得和未完成的得分。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_49: 6.使用短语“投球局数”的任何MLB投币将使用比分数来分级。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_50: 例如，客场先发投手投满五局比赛，然后在六局下半面对三个打击手，但记录没有出局数。这样将被记为投球局数5.0。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_51: 或主场先发投手投满五局比赛，但是在六局下半没有投球。这样将被记为投球局数5.0。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_52: 对于大多数投球局数，这两个投手之间的“牵制”匹配将被分级为平局。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_53: 7.对于分区冠军投币，如果两个球队在162场比赛后有相同的记录，该分区的冠军将是1）决胜局比赛的赢家，或2）MLB决胜局系统将其认定为季后赛种子球队，宣布球队为获胜者。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_54: 8.有关预测“谁是MLB击出最多全垒打的球员？”的投币，如果在常规赛结束时出现多名球员并列第一的情况，则在并列第一的球员中打击率最高的球员为唯一胜出球员。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_55: 9.对于“常规赛季中有多少个无安打赛局”，只要比赛是无安打无得分获胜并持续至少8.5局，单个和接力无安打赛局都将计算在内。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_56: 10.只有当选手先发并且比赛进行了至少9局（主队领先的情况下至少8.5局）时，单个选手身上的特别投币才有效。如果比赛暂停，则必须在次日重新开赛，否则将退还注金。这适用于单个选手身上的所有大小盘投币。例如，如果麦可·楚奥特打出本垒打并且比赛在第7局正式结束，那么麦可·楚奥特在那场比赛中的本垒打投币仍旧无效（因为比赛没有达到8.5局）。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_57: 11.对于特定比赛中选手的一对一特别投币，只要那些选手先发并且比赛正式生效，所有投币就有效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_title13: MLB整个赛季球员特别投币：
zh.detail_baseball_explain_58: 1.对于整个赛季球员或一组球员统计数据的大小盘特别投币，每位野手必须参加他所在球队打的第一场比赛，投币才算有效。对于投手：该投手必须在他所在球队打的前八场比赛中的一场投球，投币才算有效。他的球队必须打至少155场比赛，投币才算有效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_59: 1.对于MLB一般投币，除非主队在4.5局后领先，否则比赛的结果在5局后方可作算。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_60: 2.MLB一般投币不需要任何特定的投手来开启比赛。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_61: 3.如果在某一天安排了10场或以上比赛，必须完成所有比赛或只有一场比赛未完成，MLB一般投币才能生效。缩短或推迟的比赛不能多于一场。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_62: 4.如果在某一天安排了9场或以下比赛，必须完成所有比赛，MLB一般投币才能生效。不能缩短或推迟任何比赛。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_63: 5.只有官方宣布的比赛统计数据才会用于MLB一般投币的得分。如果官方宣布比赛缩短且MLB一般投币有效，则缩短的比赛的统计将包括在评分。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_64: 6.对于投币“有多少球员会击中多个全垒打？” - 此投币指任何球员在单场比赛中击中多个全垒打。如果球员在双赛的每场比赛中击中1个全垒打，不计为该日期的多个全垒打。他必须在单场比赛中击中2个或以上全垒打，才能认定为多个全垒打。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_65: 7.对于MLB一般投币，如果某队在某天进行多场比赛（例如双赛），视每场比赛的统计数据为独立的。（例如，“单个球队的最大得分数”，Philadelphia打两场比赛，其中一场得4分，另一场得5分。将使用4分或5分，但它们不会被组合为9分。）
zh.detail_baseball_explain_title15: MLB未来：球员vs球员赛季投币：
zh.detail_baseball_explain_66: 1.对于棒球球员vs球员赛季投币，如果开赛时任何一个或两个球员在禁赛列表上，未在活动名单上或者被派送到未成年赛组，投币无效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_67: 1.棒球系列的投币基于每个系列的前三场比赛。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_68: 2.前三场比赛必须至少进行两场，投币才能生效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_69: 3.如果前三场比赛中仅有一场被推迟或取消，那么系列投币将保持原样。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_70: 4.如果前三场比赛中的两场被推迟或取消，那么该系列赛的所有投币将被评为“无效”，并退还所有费用。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_71: 5.只要中止的比赛被官方宣布为合规比赛，则将其记入系列投币。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_72: 6.请注意，系列赛投币不指定任何投手，所有投币都会有效，与开球投手无关。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_title17: 季后赛/职业棒球赛选择 4：
zh.detail_baseball_explain_73: 每个组合列出了季后赛中最后四支主要联盟球队的完成顺序，由名称顺序指定如下：
zh.detail_baseball_explain_78: 例子：假设季后赛结果如下：
zh.detail_baseball_explain_79: •Dodgers队在国家联赛冠军赛中击败了Braves队。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_80: •Twins队在美国联赛冠军赛中击败Angels队。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_81: •然后Dodgers队在职业棒球赛中击败Twins队。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_82: 在这种情况下，获胜组合将为：Dodgers/Twins/Angels/Braves。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_83: 1.对于所有比赛，除非主队在4.5局后领先，否则比赛的结果在5局后方可作算。如果比赛被中止或暂停，则赢家将根据最后的全部局数确定，除非主队扳平，或在最后一局的下半场领先，在此情况下，赢家根据中止比赛时的分数确定。如果主队扳平比赛且随后被暂停，则预测将予退还。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_84: 2.除另行规定外，比赛不会进行到第二天。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_85: 3.对于之前安排在九局中的所有比赛，投币总分盘（大小盘）、跑线（让分盘）和替代跑线（交替盘）时，比赛必须打满9局（如果主队领先，则打满8局半）投币才生效。如果比赛被中止或进入加时赛，则分数根据最后的全部局数确定，除非主队扳平，或在最后一局的下半场领先，在此情况下，分数根据中止比赛时确定。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_86: 4.对于之前安排在七局中的所有比赛，拿双赛的第二场比赛来说，投币总分盘（大小盘）、跑线（让分盘）和替代跑线（交替盘）时，比赛必须打满7局（如果主队领先，则打满6局半）投币才生效。如果比赛被中止或进入加时赛，则分数根据最后的全部局数确定，除非主队扳平，或在最后一局的下半场领先，在此情况下，分数根据中止比赛时确定。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_87: 1.投币总分盘（大小盘）时，比赛必须打满9局（如果主队领先，则打满8局半）投币才生效。如果比赛被中止或进入加时赛，则分数根据最后的全部局数确定，除非主队扳平，或在最后一局的下半场领先，在此情况下，分数根据中止比赛时确定。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_88: 2.跑线（让分盘）和替代跑线（交替盘）投币的规则与日本棒球总数的规则相同。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_89: 对于台湾倍数显示形式，第一个值为让分盘，第二个值为倍数百分比，最后一项为价格。倍数百分比可为-100至100之间的某个整数。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_90: 请注意，当比赛结果为平局时，台湾盘口类博彩不会将之视为无效（取消）。但如果得分位于让分盘，针对正倍数百分比的投币将按原预赢金额的倍数百分比进行发奖。针对负倍数百分比的投币将按倍数百分比损失部分原风险金额。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_91: 1.在因扣倒规则而提前暂停的比赛中，所有让分盘、输赢盘和大小盘的投币均有效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_92: 2.只要WBC官方机构评出最终赢家，所有针对暂停赛事（已开赛）的投币均在开赛后的72小时内有效。输赢盘投币仅在比赛至少完成4.5局时有效。让分盘和大小盘投币仅在比赛至少完成8.5局时有效（扣倒规则的比赛除外，参见上述规则）。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_93: 3.所有针对延期比赛的投币均无效。一旦延期比赛改期，正常投币规则均适用。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_94: 4.奖池投币 - 如果池内的2或3支球队之间产生平局，将根据世界棒球经典赛赢得决胜局的球队（奖池中在下一轮中被视为头号球队）视为赢家。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_95: 1.任何因“慈悲规则”提前结束的比赛都对世界少棒大赛的所有投币有效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_96: 2.只要比赛在世界少棒大赛原定时间的60小时内完成，那么延期或暂停的比赛的投币都将起效。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_97: 3.我们不保证固定位置底部列出的球队是世界少棒大赛的主队。
zh.detail_baseball_explain_98: 4.所有官方比赛的输赢盘投币都将有效（4局，主队领先为3.5局）。要想有关总分和跑垒盘的投币有效，比赛必须进行6局（主队领先为5.5局），扣倒规则的比赛除外（参见规则#1）。
zh.detail_snooker_explain_1: 1.对抗赛博彩的输赢是取决于阁下能否正确地挑选出一位球员， 以主办机构的裁判结果为准， 为赛事的胜出者。 在某场赛事中， 如果因为不确切的原因未能打完一整个回合， 则升级到下个一回合的选手 （或者由主办机构宣布为赛事/锦标得胜者）将发奖计算中被认定为的获胜者。 当发生整个赛事没有实际进行比赛的情形时， 则将退还本金。
zh.detail_snooker_explain_2: 2.投币在正确点数比的彩票， 其发奖是跟据对于该局英式桌球最终比分的预测准确与否进行计算的。 发生该赛事开赛之后， 由于不明原因而未能进行到结束， 或者根本没有比赛的情形时， 则所有预测的本金将获得退还。
zh.detail_snooker_explain_3: 3.在彩池制度中， 当盘口内容是 “锦标夺冠的倍数” 时， 被投币的球员如果没有出赛， 则该注彩票将被当作输掉处理。
zh.detail_snooker_explain_4: 4.对于由多个比赛阶段组成的英式桌球比赛，Pinnacle体育博彩在每个阶段开打前都可能开出盘口。所有下在英式桌球比赛的注单都将依据整场比赛的赛果进行发奖，而不是依据个别阶段的赛果的。
zh.detail_darts_explain_1: 1.投币在最终胜出者 (冠军倍数) 的预测，永不失效。 不幸投币在半途退出的选手的预测， 将做赌输论.
zh.detail_darts_explain_2: 2.淘汰赛预测： 只要在第一循环中，有选手掷标， 则那位被升上去下一轮循环赛的选手， 即被确定为胜出者。 若无人掷标， 则所有预测作废。
zh.detail_darts_explain_3: 3.全场赛预测： 事先规定的全部场次, 必须都打完。 如因任何原因 这些场次未能打完，尽管有选手获奖或夺冠，所有预测仍然作废。
zh.detail_game_content_one: 预测结算将以指定赛事、广播或游戏API的相关管理机构宣布的官方结果为依据。对无效/无结果/未参赛的预测将视为无效。若赛事结果不允许出现和局，因而进行的加时赛的赛事结果将被视为最终有效赛事结果。所有电子竞技预测皆以法定完场时间的赛事结果为准，除非特别声明。
zh.detail_game_content_two: 基于一些无法预测的情况 - 比如作弊- 组办单位可以推翻赛果,该赛事所有的投币作废及退还。如果组办单位推翻赛果，通知重赛时平台已经开奖，开奖时的赛事结果将被视为该场预测的最终有效赛事结果。如果组办单位宣布该场比赛为不战先胜 - 即比赛从未开始而其中的队伍获胜 - 则所有投币作废。 如果一支队伍或队员在比赛进行中退赛,则根据正式赛果发奖给只已完成投币项目的有效投币。投币类型如胜负盘，让球盘以及总比分结果将被作废,除非比赛完整完成。在只有一支队伍参赛或另一队告退，则所有未决定的投币类型作废。
zh.detail_game_content_three: 出于结算目的，未进行或被推迟的比赛将视为无效/无结果/未参赛，除非相关比赛能在原定开赛时间后的48小时内进行。重赛将会被另行处理。
zh.detail_game_content_four: 如果所列赛事不正确，预测将视为无效。
zh.detail_game_content_five: 如果标准赛事数量被更改或有别于投币站提供的数目，平台保留作废投币的权利。
zh.detail_game_content_six: 如果由于队伍离开组织，加入另一组织或正式更名而使队伍名称有所改变，所有预测仍然成立。
zh.detail_game_content_seven: 如果比赛在预定开始日期/时间前举行，所有在实际开始时间后进行的预测将视为无效。所有在实际开始时间前进行的预测仍然成立。
zh.detail_game_content_eight: “总冠军“类投币，即预先投币完整赛季结束后的最终赛果，例如联赛冠军，获胜小组，参赛者以及竞赛有关的最终位置，哪一轮被淘汰，或队伍和参赛者排名。”总冠军“类投币项目只有赢得奖金或预测失败两种结果。
zh.detail_game_content_nine: 赢得比赛/赢得地图（包括当前和下一张）- 如果由于平局而使一场比赛或地图争夺战重新进行，则重新进行的比赛或地图争夺战将被单独看待。如果比赛或地图争夺战开始但未完成，则所有预测将视为无效，除非比赛开始后，参赛者被取消资格。在这种情况下，出于结算目的，进入下一轮的或者被指定赛事、广播或游戏API的管理机构授予胜利的参赛者/参赛队将被视为获胜者。
zh.detail_game_content_ten: 如果参赛者/参赛队在赛事开始前获得至少一次地图争夺战的“不战而胜”（walkover），则所有预测将视为无效。
zh.detail_game_content_eleven: 如果赛事或者地图争夺战由于断线或者非玩家相关的技术问题而被重新进行，赛前预测将在重新进行的地图上成立，并根据官方结果进行结算。
zh.detail_game_content_twelve: 让分预测/地图总预测/正确比分预测/“首先获得”地图 - 如果规定的地图数目有所更改或与所提供的有差异，出于结算目的，所有预测将视为无效。如果比赛开始但未完成，则所有预测将视为无效，除非结果已被确定。
zh.detail_game_content_thirteen: 至少赢得一张地图 - 如果比赛开始但未完成，则所有预测将视为无效，除非结果已被确定。
zh.detail_lol_content_1: 全场预测：如果出现平局，“赢得比赛”盘口将视为无效。
zh.detail_lol_content_2: “首杀（一血）”盘口：只有被对方队伍/玩家杀死才可计算在内。
zh.detail_lol_content_3: “击杀”盘口：将根据官方记分板、广播或游戏API结算。
zh.detail_lol_content_4: “怪兽”盘口：将根据官方记分板、广播或游戏API结算。
zh.detail_lol_content_5: “建筑物”盘口：出于结算目的，无论最后一击来自英雄或小兵，或建筑物是否刷新过，所有被摧毁的建筑物均计为被对方队伍摧毁。
zh.detail_lol_content_6: 如果出现投降情况，摧毁的塔和水晶的最终数量将根据投降时赢得比赛所需塔和水晶的最少数量进行结算。这些额外建筑物将被视为被获胜队伍摧毁，但仅限于五座塔及一个水晶。
zh.detail_lol_content_7: 如果出现投降情况，在“摧毁的下一建筑物”盘口上的预测将被视为无效。
zh.detail_lol_content_8: 所有基于时间的预测将根据游戏内时钟结算，且不包括小兵刷新前的时间。如果比赛开始但未完成，则所有预测将视为无效，除非结果已被确定。
zh.detail_dota2_content_1: 全场预测：如果出现平局，“赢得比赛”盘口将视为无效。
zh.detail_dota2_content_2: “首杀（一血）”盘口：只有被对方队伍/玩家杀死才可计算在内。
zh.detail_dota2_content_3: “击杀”盘口：将根据官方记分板、广播或游戏API结算。
zh.detail_dota2_content_4: “小兵”盘口：将根据官方的记分板、广播或游戏API进行结算。
zh.detail_dota2_content_5: “怪兽”盘口：将根据官方记分板、广播或游戏API结算。结算取决于杀死肉山而非拿起“不朽之守护”的队伍。
zh.detail_dota2_content_6: “建筑物”盘口：出于结算目的，无论最后一击来自英雄或小兵，所有被摧毁的建筑物均计为被对方队伍摧毁。兵营的数量取决于所摧毁的各个远程兵营和近战兵营。
zh.detail_dota2_content_7: 如果出现投降情况，在“摧毁某一建筑物”盘口上的预测将被视为无效。
zh.detail_dota2_content_8: 所有基于时间的预测将根据游戏内时钟结算，且不包括小兵刷新前的时间。如果比赛开始但未完成，则所有预测将视为无效，除非结果已被确定。
zh.detail_cs_content_1: 若有加时赛，其将包括在盘口结算内；除非平局预测在指定盘口中列出，此时结算仅取决于常规时间。
zh.detail_cs_content_2: 地图/赛轮预测 - 如果规定的地图/赛轮数有所更改或与所提供的有差异，出于结算目的，所有预测将视为无效。
zh.detail_cs_content_3: 赛轮预测 - 如果赛轮由于断线或者非玩家相关的技术问题而被重新进行，赛前预测将在重新进行的赛轮上成立，并根据官方结果进行结算。重新进行的赛轮将被单独看待。
zh.detail_cs_content_4: “击杀”盘口：将根据官方记分板、广播或游戏API结算。
zh.detail_cs_content_5: “炸弹”盘口：将根据官方记分板、广播或游戏API结算。
zh.detail_starcraft_content_1: 全场预测：如果出现平局，“赢得比赛”盘口将视为无效。
zh.detail_starcraft_content_2: 获胜比赛/获胜选手国籍：如果比赛开始但未完成，则所有预测将视为无效，除非结果已被确定。
zh.detail_scram_content_one: 滚球预测是指对正在进行比赛进行预测。投币单会在赛事进行期间继续收订单并且在关盘后停止收单。
zh.detail_scram_content_two: 以下是针对现场投币类别所制订的通用规则。
zh.detail_scram_content_one_1: 1、所有的盘口都将根据全场赛果计算。
zh.detail_scram_content_one_2: 2、平台有全权决定盘口。在赛事进行中，不能保证连续时间都有盘口提供。
zh.detail_scram_content_one_3: 3、投币在明显错误盘口的预测，平台保留取消权。
zh.detail_scram_content_one_4: 4、除此之外，现场投币单的受理将依据平台对于该种赛事现场投币所制订的规则执行。
zh.detail_finance_content_one: 所有投币在预测规定的时间和日期后结算。
zh.detail_finance_content_two: 市场交易数据、交易结果将从信誉良好的第三方取得。
zh.detail_finance_content_three: 如果市场基于技术问题未获得有效数据或数据无法得到确认，平台有权利保留延迟发奖直至得到可信任第三方的数据确认。
zh.detail_finance_content_four: 如果市场找不到可信第三方数据确认，预测无效，投币将退还。
zh.detail_finance_content_five: 本平台有权在任何时候纠正错误发奖。
zh.detail_finance_content_six: 如果倍数明显有误，本平台保留取消该投币的权利。
zh.detail_finance_number_asset_content_one: 收盘时间以世界统一时间（UTC) 0点为准。收盘价按各市场成交量加权平均值计算得出。
zh.detail_finance_number_asset_content_two: 投币项目只有上涨或下跌两种结果；如果遇到涨跌幅为0%，投币将退还。
zh.detail_finance_number_asset_content_thre: 市场交易数据、交易结果以https://coinmarketcap.com/为准。
zh.detail_lottery_title_content_one: 如果开奖结果无法得到正式确认，本平台将有权利保留延迟发奖直至得到官方的正式确认。
zh.detail_lottery_title_content_two: 如果倍数明显有误，本平台保留取消该投币的权利。这包括比平均市场大于一倍倍数误差。
zh.detail_lottery_title_content_three: 如果直播停顿而开奖结果并未受影响，所有投币类型会根据结果发奖。当某个投币类型结果无法得到正式确认，本平台保留作废该投币的权利。
zh.detail_lottery_title_content_four: 本平台有权在任何时候纠正错误发奖。
zh.detail_lottery_title_content_five: 如果一个彩票的规则或格式异于本平台接受的标准，本平台保留作废该投币的权利。
zh.detail_lottery_title_content_six: 彩票开奖结果无法被找到的，则在彩票开奖后24小时后预测无效。
zh.detail_lottery_title_content_seven: 彩票数据和结果将从信誉良好的第三方获取。
zh.detail_lottery_title_content_eight: 中国福利彩票，开奖信息可在http://www.cwl.gov.cn查询。
zh.detail_lottery_title_content_nine: 韩国Lotto，开奖信息可在http://www.nlotto.co.kr查询。
zh.detail_notice: 如有遇到任何问题，请通过客服email与我们联系：support@coingame.com

en.detail_paragraph_one: Coingame is a revolutionary new platform allowing crypto enthusiasts to predict event outcomes securely with Ethereum Classic. The platform uses smart contracts, which are transparent, unalterable, and tamper-proof, ensuring that participants do not have to trust a third party to honor the prediction.
en.detail_paragraph_two: Ethereum Classic is a decentralized platform that runs smart contracts: applications that run exactly as programmed without any downtime, censorship, fraud or third-party interference. It is a continuation of the original Ethereum blockchain - the classic version preserving untampered history; free from external interference and subjective tampering of transactions.
en.detail_paragraph_three: Participants make a prediction and deposit Ethereum Classic tokens into the smart contract. Once the prediction period is over, the smart contract automatically checks a trusted third party for the result of the prediction and divides the winnings amongst the participants.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_one: If the results of the competition cannot be formally confirmed, the platform reserves the right to retain or delay the payout until an official confirmation is obtained.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_two: If a prediction is made after the result of a competition, the platform reserves the right to void such a prediction.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_three: If the multiple are obviously wrong, the platform reserves the right to cancel the relevant prediction. This includes more than one multiple error than the average market multiple.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_four: If the live broadcast is paused but the competition is not affected, all prediction types will be awarded based on the official results. When the results of the competition of a certain prediction type cannot be formally confirmed, the platform reserves the right to void the prediction.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_five: The platform reserves the right to correct wrong payouts at any time.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_six: If the event is not based on a formal form (such as unusual time, statistical steps, event formats, etc.), the platform reserves the right to void the prediction.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_seven: If the rules, or format of an event, differ from the standards accepted by the platform, the platform reserves the right to void the prediction.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_eight: All prediction types will be based on the regular time of competition unless otherwise indicated.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_nine: If the event cannot be completed or continued (for example, due to disqualification, distraction, withdrawal from the game, lottery change, etc.), all undetermined prediction types shall be deemed invalid. If there are other items not covered by the rules, the platform will reserve the right to make final decisions to ensure fairness and justice.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_ten: All prediction types (except for halftime, first half, overtime, penalty kicks) will be based on the regular time of the competition. If a competition is disrupted, but resumes within 48 hours of the kickoff, all valid predictions will be awarded based on the final result and all undetermined predictions will be void. Regular 90 minutes: unless otherwise stated, the settlement of the soccer prediction will be based on the regular completion time. This includes injury time but does not include overtime and penalty kicks.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_eleven: If the competition or market results cannot be found, the prediction will be invalid 24 hours after the kickoff.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_twelve: Competition time, data and results will be obtained from reputable third parties.
en.detail_terms_conditions_win_content: Outright prediction is placed on the outcome of an entire league or competition rather than on an individual game. Outright predictions are usually placed before the season starts but are also available even during the course of the competition. Each country carries its own multiple.
en.detail_terms_victory_defeat_content: Also known as three-way prediction, this is often used for games which can result in a home win, draw or away win.
en.detail_terms_victory_defeat_content_seco: For example, let’s say you want to make a prediction on the England vs Germany match, you would be able to predict that either England or Germany wins, or that the match will end in a draw. Each result carries its own multiple.
en.detail_terms_asian_disks_content: This form of prediction takes the skills of the soccer teams into consideration and applies a handicap to the stronger team. This means that the stronger team must not only win, but also exceed the weaker team by a prescribed number of goals. This precludes the match from ending in a draw, leaving the prediction as a binary choice with a near 50/50 chance of success.
en.detail_terms_asian_disks_content_new: For grading purposes, when placing a Live Soccer Asian Handicap wager, the handicap and price displayed are for the match from the point the wager is accepted. Goals/Corners/Bookings scored previously (ie. current score) are ignored for a Live Asian Handicap wager. Unless otherwise specified, all Live Soccer Asian Handicap wagers will be settled based on the goals scored in the remainder of the match during Regulation Time. All goals/corners/bookings scored before the wager is accepted are not included.
en.detail_terms_scores_results: Handicap and outcomes are as follows:
en.detail_terms_scores_results_focus: NB: The plus signs in the Team Outcome columns indicate 'or more', e.g., '2+' means 'by 2 goals or more'.
en.detail_terms_scores_results_focus_second: In the unlikely event that a whole number is used for the handicap, the handicap-adjusted final score could result in a draw. This situation is not a draw, but a push. In the event of a push, all participants have their original wagers returned as there is no winner.
en.detail_football_explain_0_content: If either team wins by any margin, they (the winning team) are to be considered as the winning selection. In the event of a draw, all predictions are void and stakes are refunded.
en.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_two: - Win by any score - All predictions on this selection are winners.
en.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_thr: - Draw - Half the stake is refunded on this selection. The other half of the stake is classified as a loser.
en.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_fou: - Lose by any score - All predictions on this selection are losers.
en.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_six: - Win by any score - All predictions on this selection are winners.
en.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_sev: - Draw - Half the stake is settled at the price of the chosen selection. The other half is refunded to the customer.
en.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_eig: - Lose by any score - All predictions on this selection are losers.
en.detail_football_explain_05_content_two: - Win by any score - All predictions on this selection are winners.
en.detail_football_explain_05_content_three: - Draw - All predictions on this selection are losers.
en.detail_football_explain_05_content_four: - Lose by any score - All predictions on this selection are losers.
en.detail_football_explain_05_content_six: - Win by any score - All predictions on this selection are winners.
en.detail_football_explain_05_content_seven: - Draw - All predictions on this selection are winners.
en.detail_football_explain_05_content_eight: - Lose by any score - All predictions on this selection are losers.
en.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_two: - Win by 2 or more - All predictions on this selection are winners.
en.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_thr: - Win by exactly 1 - Half the stake is settled at the price of the chosen selection. The other half is refunded to the customer.
en.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_fou: - Draw or lose by any score - All predictions on this selection are losers.
en.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_six: - Draw or win by any score - All predictions on this selection are winners.
en.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_sev: - Lose by exactly 1 - Half the stake is refunded to the customer. The other half is classed as a loser.
en.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_eig: - Lose by 2 or more - All predictions on this selection are losers.
en.detail_football_explain_1_content_one: Team giving a full ball start:
en.detail_football_explain_1_content_two: - Win by 2 or more - All predictions on this selection are winners.
en.detail_football_explain_1_content_three: - Win by exactly 1 - All predictions on this selection are void and refunded to the customer.
en.detail_football_explain_1_content_four: - Draw or lose - All predictions on this selection are losers.
en.detail_football_explain_1_content_five: Team receiving a full ball start:
en.detail_football_explain_1_content_six: - Win by any score or draw - All predictions on this selection are winners.
en.detail_football_explain_1_content_seven: - Lose by exactly 1 - All predictions on this selection are void and refunded to the customer.
en.detail_football_explain_1_content_eight: - Lose by 2 or more - All predictions on this selection are losers.
en.detail_football_explain_O_U_content_one: Big or Small will predict a number for a statistic in a given game (usually the combined score of the two teams), and participants predict that the actual number in the game will be either higher or lower than that number.
en.detail_football_explain_2_handicap_conte: -If there is no goal or only one goal, this prediction wins. If there are two goals, the wager will be returned. If there are 3 or more goals, this prediction loses.
-If there are three or more goals, this prediction wins. If there are 2 goals, the wager will be returned. If there is no goal or only 1 goal, this prediction loses.
en.detail_football_explain_2_25_handicap_co: -If there is no goal or only 1 goal, this prediction wins. If there are 2 goals, half the wager is treated as a win, and the other half will be returned. If there are 3 or more goals, this prediction loses.

-If there are 3 or more goals, this prediction wins. If there are 2 goals, half the wager will be returned and the other half treated as a loss. If there is no goal or only 1 goal, this prediction loses.
en.detail_football_explain_25_handicap_cont: -If there is no goal or 1 or 2 goals, this prediction wins. If there are 3 or more goals, this prediction loses.
-If there are 3 or more goals, this prediction wins. If there is no goal or only 1 or 2 goals, this prediction loses.
en.detail_football_explain_25_3_handicap_co: -If there is no goal or only 1 or 2 goals, this prediction wins. If there are 3 goals, half the wager will be returned and the other half treated as a loss. If there are 4 or more goals, the prediction loses.

-If there are 4 or more goals, this prediction wins. If there are 3 goals, half the wager will be returned and the other half treated as a win. If there is no goal or only 1 or 2 goals, this prediction loses.
en.detail_football_explain_3_handicap_conte: -If there is no goal or only 1 or 2 goals, this prediction wins. If there are 3 goals, the wager will be returned. If there are 4 or more goals, this prediction loses.
-If there are 4 or more goals, this prediction wins. If there are 3 goals, the wager will be returned. If there is no goal or only 1 or 2 goals, this prediction loses.
en.detail_tennis_content_1_title: The prediction items of the relevant events will continue to be valid if:
en.detail_tennis_content_1_3: Change of indoor to outdoor, and vice versa
en.detail_tennis_content_1_4: Change of court surface (either before or during the game)
en.detail_tennis_content_2_1: If the match is not completed after it begins, all predictions will be void. Unless the player is disqualified after such beginning (the player/team advanced to the next round will be considered to win and govern the settlement).
en.detail_tennis_content_3_1: If the number of games is not completed or changed, all predictions will be void. The match must be completed and the prediction is valid. All predictions will be void if the player is disqualified or withdraws from the match.
en.detail_tennis_content_4_1: If a player is disqualified or withdraws from the match, all predictions will be void unless the prediction has been determined.
en.detail_tennis_content_5_title: Win the championship prediction / quarterfinal prediction / semi-final prediction
en.detail_tennis_content_5_1: The player must score at least 1 point in the tournament and the prediction is valid. Predictions on any player who does not participate in the tournament will be considered void.
en.detail_tennis_content_6_1: The prediction settlement will be based on data published on the official website of the relevant competition or event. When the official website does not exist or there is significant evidence proving that the official website data is incorrect, we will settle the information based on the relevant independent information.
en.detail_tennis_content_6_2: In the absence of consistent and independent evidence, or contradictory evidence, predictions will be settled on our own data.
en.detail_basketball_content_1_1: Predictions before the start of the game will include the total score for overtime which shall prevail unless otherwise indicated.
en.detail_basketball_content_1_2: All matches must be played on the specified date (local stadium time), otherwise the prediction will be void. If the venue of the game changes, as long as the home team position has not changed, all predictions placed remain effective. If the match between the home team and away team in the listed event is changed to the away team’s site, the prediction will still be effective as long as the home team is still the official 'home team', otherwise the prediction will be void.
en.detail_basketball_content_1_3: In particular, three-on-three, street basketball and Big3 games will be settled according to official rules. If the event has already started but not completed, the prediction will be void unless the outcome of the relevant line has been determined.
en.detail_basketball_content_1_4: Unless otherwise stated, the draw rule shall apply in two lines. A single prediction will be refunded, and this option will be considered void/no result/no participation in the all-up prediction.
en.detail_basketball_content_2_1: The prediction settlement will be based on the data published by the official score provider or official website of the relevant competition or event. When the official score provider or official website does not exist or there is significant evidence proving that the official score provider or official website data is incorrect, we will conduct the settlement based on the relevant independent information.
en.detail_basketball_content_2_2: If the match is disturbed or delayed and the game is not resumed within 48 hours since the beginning of the game, the prediction will be void. If the multiple are opened in the incorrect game time (more than 2 minutes), the company reserves the right to cancel the prediction. If the prediction type accepts the prediction and the performance is incorrect and has a significant impact on the price, the company reserves the right to void the prediction. If the game is not ended with a draw, but there is overtime for the qualifying round, the prediction will be awarded according to the results of the statutory game.
en.detail_baseball_explain_1: 1.Statistics provided by the official score(s) provider or the official website of the relevant competition will be used to settle wagers. Where statistics from an official score(s) provider or official website are not available or there is significant evidence that the official score(s) provider or official website is incorrect, we will use independent evidence to support prediction settlement.
en.detail_baseball_explain_2: 2.In the absence of consistent, independent evidence or in the presence of significant conflicting evidence, predictions will be settled after a thorough investigation.
en.detail_baseball_explain_3: 3.Pinnacle does not recognize postponed games, protests or overturned decisions for wagering purposes. As long as the event is played on the schedule day, all predictions have action. If inclement weather (or similar delay) pushes the start time past midnight local time, but the game is still played, all predictions have action.
en.detail_baseball_explain_4: Money-line wagers on baseball will be accepted in the following manner:
en.detail_baseball_explain_5: 1.Action - team against team, regardless of the starting pitchers. When listed pitchers are offered and there is a pitching change prior to the game, the moneyline will be re-adjusted and "action" wagers will be graded using the opening price for the new pitcher.
en.detail_baseball_explain_6: 2.Listed Pitchers - if both starting pitchers are not as specified at the time of the prediction, the wager will be deemed "no action".
en.detail_baseball_explain_7: 3.One Listed Pitcher - this is a wager on or against one specified pitcher, regardless of the other starting pitcher. If the specified pitcher does not start, the wager is deemed "no action". (examples: "the Red Sox versus Helling" indicates a wager against Helling. "Helling against the Red Sox" indicates a wager on Helling).
en.detail_baseball_explain_8: Please Note: Typographical errors in a pitcher's name will not be grounds for wager cancellation.
en.detail_baseball_explain_9: 1.When listed pitchers are offered, wagers on total runs (over/under) and team totals (over/under) and Run Line (handicap) and Alternate Run Line (alternate handicap) will have no action if a pitcher change occurs prior to both listed pitchers throwing at least one pitch.
en.detail_baseball_explain_10: 2.A pitcher is deemed a starter after throwing the first pitch to the opponent's first batter.
en.detail_baseball_explain_title4: Treatment for date or venue change
en.detail_baseball_explain_11: 1.If an event is not played on its scheduled date all wagers on the event will have no action.
en.detail_baseball_explain_12: 2.If an event venue is changed all wagers on the event will have no action.
en.detail_baseball_explain_title5: Treatment if event does not come to its natural conclusion
en.detail_baseball_explain_13: 1.If a game is called or suspended, the winner is determined by the score after the last full inning unless the home team scores to tie, or takes the lead in the bottom half of the inning, in which case the winner is determined by the score at the time the game is called. Monies will be refunded if the home team ties the game and it is then suspended. Events will not carry over to the following day unless otherwise specified.
en.detail_baseball_explain_14: 2.If a game is called or suspended in extra innings, the score will be determined after the last full inning unless the home team scores to tie, or takes the lead in the bottom half of the inning, in which case the score is determined at the time the game is called.
en.detail_baseball_explain_15: 3.In the case of a suspended playoff game that will be resumed in a span of 96 hours after its suspension, all wagers have action and will be graded after the completion of the game. If the game is not completed within the 96 hours following the time of suspension, then all predictions have no action.
en.detail_baseball_explain_16: 4.For wagers on Live Baseball all games must go 9 innings (8.5 innings if the home team is leading) and be played to completion within 7 days of the start time to have action (except “Mercy Rule” games, see below). This rule applies to wagers on the Moneyline, Runline and Totals. Example: A live game is suspended in the 7th inning and is not resumed in 7 days. All wagers on Moneyline, Runline and Totals have no action even if the outcome of a wager is already determined. A wager on the Over 7 runs at a score of 5-8 is considered no action.
en.detail_baseball_explain_17: 5.For wagers on Pregame or Live Baseball on a specific inning or a group of innings those wagers have action if the specific timeframe is completed, regardless if the entire game has concluded.
en.detail_baseball_explain_18: 6.Wagers made prior to the start of a game in the live trading folder will be cancelled if that game is postponed after not starting on its scheduled day.
en.detail_baseball_explain_title6: Treatment of Mercy Rule games in Live
en.detail_baseball_explain_19: 1.Games in which a mercy rule is invoked (such as World Baseball Classic games) will have all wagers graded based upon the final score at the time of the rule’s invocation.
en.detail_baseball_explain_20: 1.Every effort will be made to denote double header games as G1 and G2(Game 1 and Game 2).
en.detail_baseball_explain_21: 2.A wager made on a game with a G1 or G2 designation, will strictly apply to that specific game of the double header. For example, if you wager on the G1 Dodgers to beat the G1 Nationals with listed pitchers of Kershaw and Scherzer, then you'll only have action if Kershaw and Scherzer both start Game 1. If Kershaw and/or Scherzer were to start Game 2, then your wager, in this case, would not have action.
en.detail_baseball_explain_22: 3.If on a day where a double header is played and neither G1 nor G2 is designated on our site at the time of the wager, the following rules shall apply:
en.detail_baseball_explain_23: a.Any listed pitcher wager, with no G1 or G2 designation, will have action on the game(either first or second of double header) that those listed pitchers start.
en.detail_baseball_explain_24: b.An action wager will have action on the specific game(either first or second), if the listed pitchers on the site start that specific game.
en.detail_baseball_explain_25: c.An action wager will have action on the first game of the double header, if the listed pitchers on the site don't face each other in either of the games of the double header.
en.detail_baseball_explain_title8: Minimum time (length of event) needed for action
en.detail_baseball_explain_26: 1.The result of a game is official after 5 innings of play unless the home team is leading after 4.5 innings. When wagering on either runlines, total runs (over/under) or team totals (over/under) the game must go 9 innings (8.5 if the home team is ahead) to have action.
en.detail_baseball_explain_27: 2.In the case that a Run Ahead or Mercy Rule is invoked, games will be considered to be complete. Games wagers on runlines, totals, team totals and money line will have action.
en.detail_baseball_explain_28: 3.First half MLB wagers on Money Line and Spread must go 5 innings for action, or 4.5 innings if a game is ended early and called official with the home team declared the winner.
en.detail_baseball_explain_29: 4.If a game does not go a full five innings, all first-half wagers on the total will have no action.
en.detail_baseball_explain_30: 5.When pitchers are offered for the game, all first-half wagers (5 innings) must list both pitchers. If either listed pitcher does not start, wagers on the first half (5 innings) will have no action.
en.detail_baseball_explain_31: 1.MLB regular season win predictions will be graded when the following two things occur:
en.detail_baseball_explain_32: a.The team, mathematically, cannot win the number of games indicated in the prediction.
en.detail_baseball_explain_33: b.The team, at the time of grading, is expected to play at least 160 games. In other words, there is no indication that the season will be shortened at the time of grading.
en.detail_baseball_explain_34: 2.For grading purposes, no extra tiebreaker games for wildcard or division will count toward the regular season win total.
en.detail_baseball_explain_35: 3.If there is any doubt that the season will be less than 160 games for a team, we will wait to grade regular season win predictions until after the 160th game. However, once a regular season win prediction has been graded, it will not be changed, even if the team ends up playing less than 160 games.
en.detail_baseball_explain_title10: Grand Salami (Away Runs vs Home Runs):
en.detail_baseball_explain_36: 1.The Grand Salami will be decided by the total runs scored in all games of the specific league scheduled for that day.
en.detail_baseball_explain_37: 2.All scheduled games must play at least 9 innings (8.5 if the home team is leading) for wagers on the Grand Salami to have action and all games must be started on their scheduled date. The Salami will have action if all scheduled games meet the above requirement, even if there is a game(games) that is suspended after 9 innings are complete. The Salami will be graded the night of that date's games. Runs scored in the re-start of a suspended game on a future date will have no affect on the grading of a Salami wager in the regular season.
en.detail_baseball_explain_38: 3.For the Grand Salami (Away Runs vs Home Runs) , the home team runs will be the runs scored by the teams batting 2nd in their first inning. On rare occasions, a team batting second will not be playing at their home stadium. In these instances, the team batting 2nd will still be considered as a home team for this proposition.
en.detail_baseball_explain_title11: MLB Hits, Runs and Errors ( MLB H-R-E)
en.detail_baseball_explain_39: 1.All MLB R-H-E wagers will be graded using the sum of Runs, Hits and Errors as grading factors. For example:
en.detail_baseball_explain_40: 2.will result in a MLB H-R-E score of LA Angels 11, Cleveland 24
en.detail_baseball_explain_41: 3.When wagering on MLB H-R-E totals (over/unders) or MLB H-R-E spreads, the game must go 9 innings (8.5 if the home team is leading) to have action.
en.detail_baseball_explain_42: 4.If a game is called or suspended in extra innings, the score will be determined after the last full inning unless the home team scores to tie in the bottom half of the inning in which case the score is determined at the time the game is called.
en.detail_baseball_explain_43: 5.For all MLB H-R-E wagers both listed pitchers must start, if pitchers are offered for the game. A pitcher is deemed a starter after throwing the first pitch to the opponent's first batter. If a listed pitcher doesn't start all wagers are no action.
en.detail_baseball_explain_44: 1.On any prop, the player(s) must start, and either throw one pitch(if pitchers), or have one plate appearance (if position players) in the designated game for the wager to have action.
en.detail_baseball_explain_45: 2.For which team will score first props, the prop will be decided and graded as soon as either team scores, regardless if the game eventually becomes official. Both listed pitchers must start for action.
en.detail_baseball_explain_46: 3.All props regarding just the outcome of the first inning will be decided and graded at the end of the first inning, regardless if the game eventually becomes official. Both listed pitchers must start for action.
en.detail_baseball_explain_47: 4.On Total Bases Propositions, listed players must start. A batter is only credited for total bases if he hits a single (1 base), a double (2 bases), a triple (3 bases) or a home run (4 bases). A walk, hit by pitch, error, balk, fielder’s choice, or passed ball do not count for Total Bases Propositions.
en.detail_baseball_explain_48: 5.Pitcher propositions "Total Runs Allowed" include both earned and unearned runs.
en.detail_baseball_explain_49: 6.Any MLB proposition using the phrase "innings pitched" will be graded using the box score number.
en.detail_baseball_explain_50: For example, a visiting starter who pitches five complete innings and then faces three batters in the top of the sixth, but records no outs. This would be graded as 5.0 innings pitched.
en.detail_baseball_explain_51: Or a home starter pitched five complete innings and did not throw a pitch in the bottom of the sixth. This would be graded as 5.0 innings pitched.
en.detail_baseball_explain_52: A "pick-em" match-up between these two pitchers for most innings pitched would be graded a tie.
en.detail_baseball_explain_53: 7.For Division Winner wagers, if two teams have the same record after 162 games, the winner of the Division will be 1) the winner of the tiebreaker game, or 2) the team declared the winner by the MLB tiebreaker system for seeding playoff teams.
en.detail_baseball_explain_54: 8.For the Proposition "Player to hit most Home Runs in MLB?", if there is a tie at the conclusion of the regular season, the player with the highest batting average, among those tied, will be declared the sole winner.
en.detail_baseball_explain_55: 9.For proposition "How many no-hitters will there be in regular season?", individual and combined no-hitters will count as long as the game is completed and lasts at least 8.5 innings.
en.detail_baseball_explain_56: 10.For individual player prop predictions to have action that player must start and the game must go at least 9 innings (8.5 innings if home team are ahead). If the game is suspended, it must be restarted on the following day, if it's not restarted on the following day, wagers will be refunded. This applies to all over/under stats for an individual.  For example, if Mike Trout hits a home run and the game officially ends in the 7th inning, then Mike Trout will still have no action on his Home Runs for that game(since the game didn't go 8.5 innings).
en.detail_baseball_explain_57: 11.For head to head player props for a specific game, all wagers will have action as long as those players start and the game becomes official.
en.detail_baseball_explain_58: 1.For season long over/under propositions for players' or groups of players' statistics for the entire season, each field player must play in the first game his team plays for action. For pitchers, that pitcher must pitch in one of his team's first eight games played for action. His team must play at least 155 games for action.
en.detail_baseball_explain_59: 1.For MLB General Props, the result of a game is official after 5 innings of play unless the home team is leading after 4.5 innings.
en.detail_baseball_explain_60: 2.MLB General Props do not require any specific pitcher to start a game.
en.detail_baseball_explain_61: 3.If there are 10 or more games scheduled on a given day, all games or all games but one must go to completion for MLB General Props to have action. No more than one game may be shortened or postponed.
en.detail_baseball_explain_62: 4.If there are 9 or fewer games scheduled on a given day, all of them must go to completion for MLB General Props to have action. No game may be either shortened or postponed.
en.detail_baseball_explain_63: 5.Only the statistics of games declared official will be used for purposes of scoring MLB General Props. If a shortened game is declared official and MLB General Props have action, then statistics of this shortened game will be included with regard to grading.
en.detail_baseball_explain_64: 6.For the prop "How many players will hit more than 1 HR today?" - This prop will refer to any player hitting more than one HR in a single game. If a player hits 1 HR in each game of a double-header, that does NOT count as more than 1 HR for the day. He must hit 2 or more HR's in a single game for it to be considered more than 1 HR.
en.detail_baseball_explain_65: 7.For MLB General Props, if a team plays more than one game on a given day (e.g. double header), the statistics of each game will be considered independent. (e.g. "Most runs scored by one team", Philadelphia plays two games, scoring 4 runs in game one and 5 runs in game two. Either the 4 runs or 5 runs will be used but they will NOT be combined as 9 runs.)
en.detail_baseball_explain_title15: MLB Futures: Player vs Player Season Props:
en.detail_baseball_explain_66: 1.For baseball player vs. player season props, if either or both players start the season on the disabled list, not on the active roster or is sent to the minors, wagers have no action.
en.detail_baseball_explain_67: 1.Wagers on baseball series are based on the first three games played ofeach series.
en.detail_baseball_explain_68: 2.At least two of the first three series games must be played for wagers to have action.
en.detail_baseball_explain_69: 3.If only one of the first three games is postponed or canceled, series wagers stand as written.
en.detail_baseball_explain_70: 4.If two of the first three games are postponed or canceled, all wagers on that series will be graded as No Action and the monies refunded.
en.detail_baseball_explain_71: 5.A called game will count toward a series wager provided it is officially declared a regulation game.
en.detail_baseball_explain_72: 6.Pitchers cannot be listed for series wagers; all wagers will have action regardless of the starting pitchers.
en.detail_baseball_explain_73: Each combination lists the exact order of finish of the final four Major League teams in the playoffs, specified by the order of names as follows:
en.detail_baseball_explain_76: 3.The loser of the American League Championship Series.
en.detail_baseball_explain_77: 4.The loser of the National League Championship Series.
en.detail_baseball_explain_78: Example: Suppose we have the following result in the playoffs:
en.detail_baseball_explain_79: •The Dodgers beat the Braves in the National League Championship Series.
en.detail_baseball_explain_80: •The Twins beat the Angels in the American League Championship Series.
en.detail_baseball_explain_81: •The Dodgers then win the World Series against the Twins.
en.detail_baseball_explain_82: In that case, the winning combination would be: Dodgers/Twins/Angels/Braves.
en.detail_baseball_explain_83: 1.For all games the result is official after 5 innings of play unless the home team is leading after 4.5 innings. If a game is called or suspended, the winner is determined by the score after the last full inning unless the home team scores to tie, or takes the lead in the bottom half of the inning, in which case the winner is determined by the score at the time the game is called. Monies will be refunded if the home team ties the game and it is then suspended.
en.detail_baseball_explain_84: 2.Events will not carry over to the following day unless otherwise specified.
en.detail_baseball_explain_85: 3.For all games previously scheduled for nine innings, when wagering on total runs (over/under), run lines (handicap) or alternate run lines (alternate handicap), the game must go 9 innings (8.5 if the home team is ahead) to have action. If a game is called or suspended in extra innings, the score will be determined after the last full inning unless the home team scores to tie, or takes the lead in the bottom half of the inning, in which case the score is determined at the time the game is called.
en.detail_baseball_explain_86: 4.For games previously scheduled for seven innings, the second game of double headers for instance, when wagering on total runs (over/under), run lines (handicap) or alternate run lines (alternate handicap) the game must go 7 innings (6.5 if the home team is ahead) to have action. If a game is called or suspended in extra innings, the score will be determined after the last full inning unless the home team scores to tie, or takes the lead in the bottom half of the inning, in which case the score is determined at the time the game is called.
en.detail_baseball_explain_87: 1.When wagering on total runs (over/under) the game must go 9 innings (8.5 if the home team is ahead) to have action. If a game is called, suspended or declared a tie in extra innings, the score will be determined after the last full inning unless the home team scores to tie, or takes the lead in the bottom half of the inning, in which case the score is determined at the time the game is called.
en.detail_baseball_explain_88: 2.Rules for Run Line (handicap) and Alternate Run Line (alternate handicap) wagers are the same as those for Japanese baseball totals.
en.detail_baseball_explain_89: For the Taiwanese multiple display format, the first value is the handicap, followed by the taiball percentage and lastly by the price. The taiball percentage can be an integer from -100 to 100.
en.detail_baseball_explain_90: Note that in the case of a tie, Taiwanese Line type predictions are not graded as no action (cancel). Instead, if the score lands on the Handicap, a wager on a Positive taiball percent will pay out the taiball percent of the original to win amount. A wager on the negative taiball percentage will lose the taiball percent of the original Risk amount.
en.detail_baseball_explain_91: 1.All spread, money line, and total wagers will have action in games stopped early due to the mercy rule.
en.detail_baseball_explain_92: 2.All predictions taken on a suspended game (one that started), will have action for 72 hours from the start time, as long as the WBC governing body recognizes an eventual winner. Money line wagers will only have action as long as the game goes at least 4.5 innings. Spread and total wagers will only have action if the game goes at least 8.5 innings (except in mercy rule games, see rule above).
en.detail_baseball_explain_93: 3.All predictions taken on a postponed game will not have action. Once the postponed game is rescheduled, normal wagering rules apply.
en.detail_baseball_explain_94: 4.Pool Wagering - In the event of a tie between 2 or 3 teams within a pool, whoever wins the tiebreaker according the world baseball classic (whichever team is considered the number 1 team from that pool in the next round) is considered the winner.
en.detail_baseball_explain_95: 1.Any game ending early as a result of a mercy rule will have action on all wagers in the Little League World Series.
en.detail_baseball_explain_96: 2.Wagers on postponed or suspended games will have action as long as the game is completed within 60 hours of its originally scheduled time in the Little League World Series.
en.detail_baseball_explain_97: 3.We make no guarantees that the team listed on the bottom of our fixtures is the home team in Little League World Series games.
en.detail_baseball_explain_98: 4.Money Line Wagers will have action in all official games (4 innings or 3.5 innings if the home team is ahead). In order for wagers on totals and run lines to have action, the game must go 6 innings (5.5 innings if home team ahead), except for mercy rule games (see rule #1).
en.detail_snooker_explain_1: 1.Match-up prediction is based upon correctly selecting the player who officially wins the match. In the event of a match starting – with the break for the first frame - but not being completed for whatever reason, the player progressing to the next round (or being declared winner of the competition/championship) will be deemed the winner. In the event of a match not starting at all, all predictions are refunded.
en.detail_snooker_explain_2: 2.Frame prediction is based upon correctly selecting the final score of a snooker match. In the event of a match starting but not being completed for whatever reason or a match not starting at all, all predictions are refunded.
en.detail_snooker_explain_3: 3.For multi-way markets of the type "Multiple to win the Championship" wagers on a non-starting player will be graded as a loss.
en.detail_snooker_explain_4: 4.For Snooker matches that contain multiple sessions, Pinnacle may offer multiple at the start of each session. All wagers placed on Snooker matches are graded based on the outcome of the entire match, not on the outcome of an individual session.
en.detail_darts_explain_1: 1.When prediction on the outright tournament winner, all wagers have action; there are no refunds. Should a player withdraw before a tournament begins, any predictions on that player to win the tournament will be graded as losses.
en.detail_darts_explain_2: 2.Match Wagers: The player progressing to the next round will be deemed the winner, providing one of the players has thrown a dart at the start of the first leg. If the first dart is not thrown, all predictions will be void.
en.detail_darts_explain_3: 3.Sets Wagers: The full number of sets required to win the match must be completed. If for any reason the match is awarded to a contestant before the full number of sets are completed, all Sets wagers on the match will be void.
en.detail_game_content_one: Forecast settlement will be based on official results announced by the relevant regulatory agencies that specify the event, broadcast or game API. Forecast for void/no results/no participation will be considered void. If the outcome of the event does not allow for a draw, the outcome of the overtime will be considered the result of the final effective result. All eSports forecasts are based on the outcome on the official final time, unless otherwise stated.
en.detail_game_content_two: Based on some unpredictable circumstances - such as cheating - organizers can overturn the results and all predictions on the event are voided and refunded. If the organizer overturns the result but the platform has already announced the awards when being informed of the replay, the result in sync with such announcement shall be regarded as the final effective result of the forecast. If the organizer announces that the result is walkover-i.e. the match never starts and the team wins-then all predictions are void. If a team or team members withdraw during the game, a valid and completed prediction will be awarded based on the official results. If the type of prediction is a “win or lose” prediction, the result of the handicap and the total score will be void unless the match is fully completed. In the event that only one team plays or the other team withdraws, all undetermined prediction types are void.
en.detail_game_content_three: For the purposes of settlement, an unplayed or postponed match will be considered void/no result/no participation unless the relevant match can be played within 48 hours of the scheduled start time. The replay will be handled separately.
en.detail_game_content_four: If the listed event is incorrect, the forecast will be considered void.
en.detail_game_content_five: The platform reserves the right to void prsediction if the number of standard events is changed or different from the number provided by the prediction station.
en.detail_game_content_six: If a team changes its name due to the team leaving the association, joining another association or officially changes its name, all forecasts will remain effective.
en.detail_game_content_seven: If the match is held before the scheduled start date/time, all forecasts made after the actual start time will be considered void. All forecasts made before the actual start time are still valid.
en.detail_game_content_eight: The “Outright” prediction item is the pre-prediction of the final result after the end of the full season, such as the league title, the winning team, the final standing of the players and the competition, elimination in which round, or the ranking of a team or a player. The “Outright” prediction item only has two outcomes: winning the awards or failing the forecast.
en.detail_game_content_nine: Win the game/win the map (both current and next) - If a match or map battle is replayed due to a draw, the replayed match or map battle will be treated separately. If the match or map battle begins but is not completed, all forecasts will be considered void unless the player is disqualified after the start of such match. In this case, for the purpose of settlement, the player/team entering the next round or being awarded by the governing body of the designated event, broadcast or game API will be regarded as the winner.
en.detail_game_content_ten: If the player/team receives at least one map battle before the start of the match, i.e. a walkover, all forecasts will be considered void.
en.detail_game_content_eleven: If a match or map battle is replayed due to a disconnected or non-player related technical issue, the pre-match forecast will be established on the map of the replay and settled based on official results.
en.detail_game_content_twelve: Handicap Forecast / Map Total Forecast / Correct Score Forecast / 'Get First' Map - If the specified number of maps is changed or different from the one provided, all forecasts will be considered void for settlement purposes. If the match starts but is not completed, all forecasts will be considered void unless the results have been determined.
en.detail_game_content_thirteen: Win at least one map - If the match starts but is not completed, all forecasts will be considered void unless the results have been determined.
en.detail_lol_content_1: Match forecast: If there is a draw, the 'Win Match' line will be considered void.
en.detail_lol_content_2: 'First kill (First blood)' line: Only counted when killed by the opponent team / player.
en.detail_lol_content_3: 'Kill' line: Will be settled subject to official scoreboard, broadcast or game API.
en.detail_lol_content_4: 'Monsters' line: Will be settled subject to official scoreboard, broadcast or game API.
en.detail_lol_content_5: 'Building' line: For settlement purposes, all destroyed buildings are counted as being destroyed by the opponent team, regardless of whether the last blow came from a hero or a minion, or the building has been refreshed.
en.detail_lol_content_6: In the event of a surrender, the final number of towers and inhibitors destroyed will be settled based on the minimum number of towers and crystals required to win the game upon surrender. These additional buildings will be considered destroyed by the winning team, but only up to five towers and one inhibitor.
en.detail_lol_content_7: In the event of a surrender, the forecast on the 'Next Destroyed Building' line will be considered void.
en.detail_lol_content_8: All time-based forecasts will be settled based on the in-game clock and do not include the time before the minions are refreshed. If the match starts but is not completed, all forecasts will be considered void unless the results have been determined.
en.detail_dota2_content_1: Match forecast: If there is a draw, the 'Win Match' line will be considered void.
en.detail_dota2_content_2: 'First kill (one blood)' line: Only counted when killed by the opponent team / player.
en.detail_dota2_content_3: 'Kill' line: Will be settled subject to official scoreboard, broadcast or game API.
en.detail_dota2_content_4: 'Creep' line: Will be settled subject to official scoreboard, broadcast or game API.
en.detail_dota2_content_5: 'Monsters' line: Will be settled subject to official scoreboard, broadcast or game API. The result is subject to killing Roshan rather than picking up the Aegis of the Immortal.
en.detail_dota2_content_6: 'Building' line: For settlement purposes, all destroyed buildings are counted as being destroyed by the opponent team, regardless of whether the last blow came from a hero or a creep. The number of the barracks is subject to the destroyed ranged and melee barracks.
en.detail_dota2_content_7: In the event of a surrender, the forecast on the “Destroy a Building” line will be considered void.
en.detail_dota2_content_8: All time-based forecasts will be settled based on the in-game clock and do not include the time before the creeps are refreshed. If the game starts but is not completed, all forecasts will be considered void unless the results have been determined.
en.detail_cs_content_1: In the case of overtime, it will be included in the line settlement; unless the draw forecast is listed in the designated line where the settlement will only be subject to the regular time.
en.detail_cs_content_2: Map/Round Forecast - If the specified map/round number is changed or different from the one provided, all forecasts will be considered void for settlement purposes.
en.detail_cs_content_3: Round Forecast - If the round is re-launched due to a disconnected or non-player related technical issue, the pre-game forecast will be established on the replay round and settled based on official results. The replayed round will be treated separately.
en.detail_cs_content_4: 'Kill' line: Will be settled subject to official scoreboard, broadcast or game API.
en.detail_cs_content_5: 'Bomb' line: Will be settled subject to official scoreboard, broadcast or game API.
en.detail_starcraft_content_1: Match forecast: If there is a draw, the 'Win Match' line will be considered void.
en.detail_starcraft_content_2: Win the game/ Winning Player’s Nationality: If the game begins but is not completed, all forecasts will be considered void unless the result has been determined.
en.detail_scram_content_one: In-play prediction refers to the prediction of the ongoing game. The forecast slip will continue to receive orders during the event and will stop to receive the order after the gaming closing.
en.detail_scram_content_two: The following are general rules which govern events in Live categories.
en.detail_scram_content_one_1: 1、All Live lines are for the complete game score.
en.detail_scram_content_one_2: 2、Lines will be offered at linemaker discretion. We do not guarantee a line at any point in the game.
en.detail_scram_content_one_3: 3、Coingame reserves the right to cancel any wager made on an obvious mistake line.
en.detail_scram_content_one_4: 4、In addition, Live Prediction wagers are decided according to Live Wagering rules specified for that sport by Coingame.
en.detail_finance_content_one: All predictions will be settled after the time and dates specified in the prediction.
en.detail_finance_content_two: Market trading data and results will be obtained from reputable third parties.
en.detail_finance_content_three: If the market does not have valid data based on technical issues, or the data cannot be confirmed, the platform has the right to retain the delayed payout until it is confirmed by a trusted third party.
en.detail_finance_content_four: If the market cannot find data confirmation from a trusted third party, the prediction will be invalid and the stake will be refunded.
en.detail_finance_content_five: The platform reserves the right to correct wrong payouts at any time.
en.detail_finance_content_six: If the multiple are obviously wrong, the platform reserves the right to cancel the relevant prediction.
en.detail_finance_number_asset_content_one: The closing time is based on 00:00 UTC. The closing price is calculated based on the weighted average of the volume of each market.
en.detail_finance_number_asset_content_two: Prediction selections only have two outcomes: up or down; if there is 0% up/down, the prediction will be refunded.
en.detail_finance_number_asset_content_thre: Market trading data and results are obtained from https://coinmarketcap.com/
en.detail_lottery_title_content_one: If the results of the lottery cannot be formally confirmed, the platform will have the right to retain the delayed payout until an official confirmation is obtained.
en.detail_lottery_title_content_two: If the multiple are obviously wrong, the platform reserves the right to cancel the prediction. This includes more than one multiple error than the average market multiple.
en.detail_lottery_title_content_three: If the live broadcast is paused and the lottery results are not affected, all prediction types will be awarded based on the results. When the result of a prediction type cannot be formally confirmed, the platform reserves the right to void the prediction.
en.detail_lottery_title_content_four: The platform reserves the right to correct the wrong payouts at any time.
en.detail_lottery_title_content_five: If the rules or format of a lottery is different from the standard accepted by the platform, the platform reserves the right to void the prediction.
en.detail_lottery_title_content_six: If the results of the lottery cannot be found, the prediction will become invalid after 24 hours of the result announcement.
en.detail_lottery_title_content_seven: Lottery data and results will be obtained from reputable third parties.
en.detail_lottery_title_content_eight: China Welfare Lottery, the lottery information can be found at http://www.cwl.gov.cn.
en.detail_lottery_title_content_nine: South Korea Lotto, the lottery information can be found at http://www.nlotto.co.kr.
en.detail_lottery_title_content_ten: US PowerBall, the lottery information can be found at https://www.powerball.com/.
en.detail_notice: If you have any concerns, please contact customer service at: support@coingame.com

ko.detail_paragraph_one: Coingame 은 투명하고 안전한 방법으로 크립토 팬들이 이벤트 결과를 예측을 할 수 있게 하는 혁신적인 새로운 플랫폼이다. 이 시스템은  ‘스마트 계약’라고 불리는 첨단 기술을 사용하여 투명하고, 수정이 불가하며 참가자들이 예측 시 제 3자를 필요로 하지 않다.
ko.detail_paragraph_two: 이더리움 클래식은 스마트 계약을 운영하는 분산화된 플랫폼으로 오류, 검사, 사기 또는 제 3자의 간섭의 가능성 없이 프로그래밍된 대로 실행되는 어플리케이션이다. 이것은 변경되지 않은 역사를 보존하고 외부의 간섭으로부터 자유로운 버전으로, 오리지널 이더리움 블록체인의 연장이다.
ko.detail_paragraph_three: 참가자들은 경기의 승패를 예측하여 이더리움 클래식 토큰을 스마트 계약에 예치시킨다. 승패 예측 기간이 끝나면 스마트 계약은 자동으로 신뢰할 수 있는 제 3자가 예측 결과를 확인하고 참가자들의 상금을 나눈다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_one: 경기 결과를 공식적으로 확인할 수없는 경우 플랫폼은 공식적인 공식 확인이 이루어질 때까지 지연된 지불금을 보유 할 권리가 있다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_two: 경기 결과가 확정된 항목에서 여전히 배팅이 가능할 경우, 플랫폼은 해당 예측 항목을 폐지할 권리가 있다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_three: 배당률이 현저하게 오류로 판단되는 경우, 플랫폼은 해당 항목을 취소 할 수있는 권한을 보유한다. 배당률이 오류로 판단되는 경우는 평균 시장 배당률보다 2배 이상의 확률 오차가 있는 것을 기준으로 한다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_four: 생방송이 일시 중지 된 상태지만 경기가 중단되지 않으면 모든 경기 유형이 공식 경기 결과에 따라 확정된다. 배팅의 결과를 공식적으로 확인할 수없는 경우, 플랫폼은 배팅을 무효화 할 권한을 보유한다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_five: 플랫폼은 언제든지 잘못된 판매 배팅을 수정할 권리가 있습니다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_six: 경기가 정규형식(예를 들면 경기 이슈, 통계 절차, 경기 형식 등)으로 진행이 되지 않았을 경우, 플랫폼은 배팅을 취소할 권리가 있다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_seven: 경기의 규치 또는 격식이 플랫폼의 기준과 일치하지 않을 경우, 플랫폼은 해당 배팅을 폐지할 권리가 있다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_eight: 모든 배팅 유형은 정규 경기 시간을 근거로 하며, 기타 이슈가 있을 시, 별도로 표시한다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_nine: 만약 경기가 정상적으로 완료 또는 지속(예를 들면 자격취소, 방해, 퇴장, 추점등 내용이 변경될 경우 등)될 수 없을 경우, 모든 확인되지 않은 배팅유형은 무효로 처리된다. 만약, 규칙상 명확히 규정된 내용이 있을 경우, 플랫폼은 공평성을 유지하는 전제하에 해당 항목에 대한 결정권을 소유한다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_ten: 모든 배팅 유형은(반전, 전반전, 추가시간, 패널티킥전 제외) 경기의 규정시간을 기준으로 한다. 만약 경기가 이슈로 인해 예상시간보다 늦어졌지만 경기시작 후 48시간 내에 경기가 계속될 경우, 모든 배팅은 최종결과를 기준으로 하며 여전히 유효하지만, 경기결과가 없는 배팅은 모두 폐기된다. 일반 경기시간90분: 별도 공지가 없는한, 축구경기의 배팅 결과는 경기의 일반시간을 기준으로 한다. 추가시간은 포함하나 연장전과 패널티킥전 결과는 포함하지 않는다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_eleven: 결과를 알 수 없는 게임이나 시장은 게임이 시작된 지 24시간 후에 예측이 무효화 되는 결과를 초래한다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_twelve: 타이밍, 경기 통계 및 결과는 제 3자 출처 (예: prediction365)를 통해 가져온다.
ko.detail_terms_conditions_win_content: 아웃라이트 예측은 개인 게임이 아니라 리그나 경기의 전체 결과에 대한 예측이다. 대개 시즌이 시작되기 전에 아웃라이트 예측을 하지만 경기 중에도 가능합니다. 각 나라마다 각자의 가능성이 있다.
ko.detail_terms_victory_defeat_content: 3차 예측으로도 알려져 있는 이 예측은 종종 홈 승리, 무승부 또는 원정 승리를 가져올 수 있는 게임에 사용된다.
ko.detail_terms_victory_defeat_content_seco: 예를 들어, 여러분이 영국과 독일의 경기에서 예측을 하고 싶다고 가정해 본다. 여러분은 영국이나 독일 중 하나가 이기거나 경기가 무승부로 끝날 것이라고 예측할 수 있다. 각각의 결과는 나름대로 가능성이 있다.
ko.detail_terms_asian_disks_content: 이런 형태의 예측은 축구 팀들의 기술을 고려하고 더 강한 팀에 핸디캡을 적용한다. 이 것은 더 강한 팀이 지정된 수의 골로 이길 뿐만 아니라 더 약한 팀을 능가해야 한다는 것을 의미합니다. 이것은 예측이 성공할 확률이 거의 50대 50인 2진법으로 끝나는 것을 막아준다.
ko.detail_terms_asian_disks_content_new: For grading purposes, when placing a Live Soccer Asian Handicap wager, the handicap and price displayed are for the match from the point the wager is accepted. Goals/Corners/Bookings scored previously (ie. current score) are ignored for a Live Asian Handicap wager. Unless otherwise specified, all Live Soccer Asian Handicap wagers will be settled based on the goals scored in the remainder of the match during Regulation Time. All goals/corners/bookings scored before the wager is accepted are not included.
ko.detail_terms_scores_results_focus: 주의: 팀 결과 열의 더하기 기호는 예를 들어 “또는 그 이상”을 나타낸다. “2+”는 “2골 이상”을 의미한다.
ko.detail_terms_scores_results_focus_second: 드문 경우이긴 하지만 전체 번호가 핸디캡에 사용된 경우, 핸디캡 조정 최종 점수가 추첨으로 이어질 수 있다. 이 상황은 무승부가 아니라 푸시다. 푸시의 경우, 우승자가 없기 때문에 모든 참가자들은 원래의 예측금을 되돌려 받다.
ko.detail_football_explain_0_content: 어느 한 팀이라도 어느 정도 이기면 우승 팀으로 결정된다. 무승부 시 모든 예측은 무효가 되며 예측금은 환불된다.
ko.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_two: - 점수에 상관 없이 우승 – 이 선택에 대한 모든 예측은 우승자이다.
ko.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_thr: - 무승부 - 지분의 절반만 돌려 받는다. 지분의 나머지 절반은 돌려받지 못한다.
ko.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_fou: - 점수에 상관없이 패배 - 이 선택에 대한 모든 예측은 패배자이다.
ko.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_six: - 점수에 상관 없이 우승 - 이 선택에 대한 모든 예측은 우승자이다.
ko.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_sev: - 무승부 – 지분의 절반은 선택된 가격으로 결정된다. 지분의 나머지 절반은 고객들에게 반환된다.
ko.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_eig: - 점수에 상관없이 패배 - 이 선택에 대한 모든 예측은 패배자이다.
ko.detail_football_explain_05_content_two: - 점수에 상관 없이 우승 – 이 선택에 대한 모든 예측은 우승자이다.
ko.detail_football_explain_05_content_three: - 무승부 - 이 선택에 대한 모든 예측은 패배자이다.
ko.detail_football_explain_05_content_four: - 점수에 상관없이 패배 - 이 선택에 대한 모든 예측은 패배자이다.
ko.detail_football_explain_05_content_six: - 점수에 상관 없이 우승 - 이 선택에 대한 모든 예측은 우승자이다.
ko.detail_football_explain_05_content_seven: - 무승부 - 이 선택에 대한 모든 예측은 우승자이다.
ko.detail_football_explain_05_content_eight: - 점수에 상관없이 패배 - 이 선택에 대한 모든 예측은 패배자이다.
ko.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_two: - 2점 또는 그 이상으로 승리 - 이 선택에 대한 모든 예측은 우승자이다.
ko.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_thr: - 정확히 1점 차이로 승리 - 지분의 절반은 선택된 가격으로 결정된다. 지분의 나머지 절반은 고객들에게 반환된다.
ko.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_fou: - 점수에 상관없이 무승부 또는 패배 - 이 선택에 대한 모든 예측은 패배자이다.
ko.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_six: - 점수에 상관없이 무승부 또는 승리 - 이 선택에 대한 모든 예측은 우승자이다.
ko.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_sev: - 정확히 1점 차이로 패배 - 지분의 절반은 고객들에게 반환된다. 지분의 나머지 절반은 돌려받지 못한다.
